dcterms:description: The CAMUS echocardiography dataset contains 500 patients with semantically segmented left ventricle myocardium, endocardium, and left atrial surface for 4 chamber and 2 chamber images at both end-diastole (ED) and end-systole (ES) frames.
dcterms:title: CAMUS echocardiography dataset

dcterms:description: The EchoNet-Dynamic Atrial 4 Chamber at End Diastole dataset is used for video-based AI assessment of cardiac function.
dcterms:title: EchoNet-Dynamic Atrial 4 Chamber at End Diastole dataset

dcterms:description: The dataset consists of 1000 synthetic cardiac meshes used for linking statistical shape models and simulated function in the healthy adult human heart.
dcterms:title: 1000 synthetic cardiac meshes

dcterms:description: Generated datasets (2CED, 2CES, 4CED, 4CES) created by the authors in this study for training and validation of segmentation models.
dcterms:title: Generated datasets (2CED, 2CES, 4CED, 4CES)

dcterms:description: The official test subset of the CAMUS dataset, reserved for testing segmentation networks.
dcterms:title: Official test subset of the CAMUS dataset
